title: Cubs' NLDS roster: Jason Hammel replaces Berry
text:
ST. LOUIS â€“ The Cubs made only one change to their playoff roster heading into the Division Series round, adding starting pitcher Jason Hammel, who replaced outfielder Quintin Berry, the designated speed guy off the bench.
Roster vs. Cardinals:
Starting pitchers: Jon Lester, Kyle Hendricks, Jake Arrieta, Hammel.
Relievers: Hector Rondon, Pedro Strop, Justin Grimm, Fernando Rodney, Clayton Richard, Trevor Cahill, Travis Wood.
Catchers: David Ross, Miguel Montero.
Infielders: Anthony Rizzo, Starlin Castro, Kris Bryant, Addison Russell, Javy Baez, Tommy La Stella.
Outfielders: Dexter Fowler, Kyle Schwarber, Chris Coghlan, Chris Denorfia, Austin Jackson, Jorge Soler.
